murmur: rhythm.name: Murmur: Rhythm
murmur: rhythm.desc: An application of the Song that enables the user to perceive the subtle Murmur emanating from all things. Press G while crouched.

ardour scream.name: Ardour Scream
ardour scream.desc: Amplify your shout into a scream using Ardour, dominating weaker foes. Victims take 12.5% more damage and 50% more posture damage for 10s.

murmur: ardour.name: Murmur: Ardour
murmur: ardour.desc: An application of the Song that enables one to channel the Murmur into raw strength. Press H.

murmur: tacet.name: Murmur: Tacet
murmur: tacet.desc: An application of the Song that enables the user to suppress their own murmur. Press T while crouched.
